name: Timothy A. Gonsalves
content: Timothy A. Gonsalves's Homepage Timothy A. Gonsalves Professor Ph.D., Stanford, 1986 M.S., Rice, Houston, 1979 B.Tech., IIT, Madras, 1976 Interests: Design and performance of computer and telecom networks. With emphasis on innovative and low-cost product and technology development for Indian and international industry. Fostering software development in small towns and rural areas.
